force_to_wanted_direction_magnitude.description: An extra force to apply towards wanted direction to make it move faster.

force_to_wanted_forward_magnitude.description: An extra force to apply towards wanted forward to make it look towards wanted forward.

rotation_started_sound.description: [string]The sound event to trigger when thruster rotation starts

rotation_stopped_sound.description: [string]The sound event to trigger when thruster rotation stops

thrust_started_sound.description: [string]The sound event to trigger when the thruster runs

thrust_stopped_sound.description: [string]The sound event to trigger when the thruster stops

crashing_started_sound.description: [string]The sound event to trigger when the thruster group begins crash

crashing_stopped_sound.description: [string]The sound event to trigger when the thruster group has crashed

acceleration.description: The acceleration used to reach max movespeed if current speed is lower than max.

deceleration.description: The deceleration used to reach max movespeed if current speed is higher than max.

crash_torque.description: Multiplied to the torque during crashing. (randomized +- 0.2)

dead_thruster_impulse_multiplier.description: Multiplier on the downward impulse applied to dead thrusters. Only applied ones on death.
